page.title: 09INDUSTRIAL COMPLEXES
page.content: THIS SMALL INDUSTRIAL COMPLEX HOUSES 18 PRODUCTION UNITS. IT IS A TYPICAL LIGHT INDUSTRY AREA PRODUCING SUCH ITEMS AS DOUBLE GLAZED WINDOWS, SAILS AND INDUSTRIAL RUBBER MOULDINGS. SUCH DEVELOPMENTS NEAR SMALL TOWNS AND AMONGST RESIDENTIAL AREAS ARE TYPICAL OF THIS AREA THOUGH PROVIDING WORK THEY DO MUCH TO DESTROY THE ENVIRONMENT. ALTHOUGH OFF THE MAIN ROAD IT IS UNSIGHTLY AND LITTLE THOUGHT WAS GIVEN TO AESTHETIC VALUES IN ITS PLANNING. THE GIRLS INVESTIGATING THE AREA SOON BECAME AN OBJECT OF GREAT INTEREST TO WORKMEN EASILY DISTRACTED FROM DAILY TOIL. THIS IS A TYPICAL 1980s REACTION OF THE MALE SEX TO PRETTY GIRLS AND IS MUCH TO BE DEPLORED. HOWEVER, IT ALSO INDICATES THAT MUCH OF THE WORK DONE IS TOO TEDIOUS TO HOLD THE ATTENTION FOR LONG.
